data.text: Huft.....

data.text:
(I've thought a lot about it since then. 
Specifically, how do I make the effort)

󠁿(I've thought a lot about it since then.

󠁿(Even until now, I'm trying to change myself.

data.text: Alright! Today I will run once again

data.processed: 󠁿Alright! Today I will run once again

I can't be like those two...

data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿I can't be like those two... 
󠁿There's no way I could, but...

data.processed: 󠁿What I can do... is there, something I can

data.text: But, I have nothing to complain about...

data.processed: 󠁿But, I have nothing to complain about...

data.text:
(Rather, I could try to come up with a menu for Trainer...? 
even if it's not training, for example....)

data.processed:
󠁿(Rather, I could try to come up with a menu for Trainer...? 
󠁿even if it's not training, for example....)

data.text:
Trainer, I have come up with a menu for breakfast, lunch and dinner. 
Of course, don't worry, I'll make it for you.
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer, I have come up with a menu for breakfast, lunch and dinner. 
󠁿Of course, don't worry, I'll make it for you.

data.text:
[For putting so much thought into nutrition and taste, Thank you! 
May I ask you to keep up the good work, Cheval Grand!]
data.name: Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿[For putting so much thought into nutrition and taste, Thank you! 
󠁿May I ask you to keep up the good work, Cheval Grand!]

data.text:
Yeah, Of course. 
This much, please leave it to me!
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, Of course. 
󠁿This much, please leave it to me!

data.text:
............ 
No... this is not... right...

󠁿............

Huh... I've had some weird thoughts.

data.text:

I just went to a cafe.

data.text: Heh?

data.text:
It was my first relaxing holiday in a long time. 
Since we're here, I decided to spent the day at a cafe.
